tweets.text:
Stealing the idea from @vgr (one of the more obscure interesting Twitter followers) and spontaneously tweet up to 100 different opinions about betting...

1 Like = 1 take on Betting í ½í´¨

@vgr 1) Extra place betting is dead. 1/5 odds 4/5 places is monstrously overrated. A rule of thumb is if you don't beat the win BSP on your bet you also won't beat the 4/5 place price on BF. Stay away from these races unless the win price is too big, it will save you money.

@vgr 2) Overnight limits have been squeezed to the extent that it has driven a lot of smart money out of the market until around 10am the following morning or even back onto the show. Don't assume that the first market move overnight is the correct one.

3) NRNB for Cheltenham is not something to get excited by. The whole point of ante post betting is knowing what race something is going for and being rewarded with a bigger price. 10/1 Samcro Supreme Novice punters are still gloating about getting their money back.
4) Guards and pay for tipping services have something in common. They both failed at something else in life  before taking this path...

5) Owners are lambs to the slaughter. Never back a horse based on what an owner thinks. An owner once had a bet in the Irish betting ring not knowing that his horse had fallen in a recent schooling session, the bookmaker knew...

6) Multiples is not a dirty word. 

If you are a winning punter and you  don't utilise multiples you will never step up to the next level. Multiples are betting weapons of mass destruction...
7) Models and algorithms are just maths. You can't model a horse having a lump of turf shoved down it's throat...
8) Not betting in novices/maidens/bumpers because there is not enough information in the public domain is shorthand for I'm shit at networking...

9) Go to the pub, get smashed, go meet people. Engage people on WhatsApp, email or carrier pigeon.  A spreadsheet can only calculate the numbers you put into it. It won't tell you anything new or interesting...
10) Don't be a nit. Give your bookmaker some action and you'll get more out of every account. In running Mexican Baseball - GET INVOLVED #internationalchase

11) Beware betting non jiggers in bad e/w races. Remember the connections of the others horses have an incentive not to finish too close to the hot fav. It will save you plenty of 4th and 5th place finishes.
12) All good punters have done the lot in, myself included. Keep going. Remember when you are lying on your back in a pool of piss some night to remain focused at looking up at the stars...
13) Don't respect people who bet big, respect people who are good judges. Some ot the shrewest punters I've met over the years get a nosebleed having Â£50 on but they always collect.
14) If someone tells you they are getting Pat Dobbs' card block them. He has blown up more tanks than Erwin Rommel...
15) Take the most risk when your betting tank is small. If you see a big rick and you can get on, move all in. You can always find another small tank, you can't always find another big rick...
16) if someone tells you they have an edge and it involves betting overnight prices remind them it's 2019...
17) Always tip the shop staff when you have a touch especially if they have big tits. Don't be the cunt that said to me "Tip the staff? Fuck them, they should be tipping their hat to me"...

18) Industry tweeters can be the bravest defenders of what's rancid with the game. Ask yourself if you put them on the street with 5k to live would they survive before assuming you should respect their opinions. .
19) Don't! I repeat, don't invest proceeds of gambling into sending two year olds to Johnny Levins...
20) Davy Russell apparently does a great impression of Eddie O'Leary í ½í±€
21) By thr time your Kelly Criterion calculates the perfect stake the price will be gone. Trust your intuition you cunt...

22) When you have a really big win or good run don't go nuclear with your next period of betting. Keep this simple thought in your mind. 

REMEMBER WHAT TYPE OF BETS GOT ME HERE
23) JP McManus stopped the Tipperary hurlers in the All Ireland Hurling Final in 2011. I don't know how but he didn't win half a million picking Kilkenny out of the paper...
24) NEVER have a long term ante post bet on you girlfriends/wifes account if the relationship is flaky. Getting paid after you get caught banging her sister is odds against...

25) WInning with others is a bigger buzz than just winning money. It's the opposite of the dreaded after time. Help a few people out with your best bets and you'll never know what favour they will return to you.
